BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Padavan, S.5140, and Assembly Members Abbate and Pheffer, et al, A.7357, "AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of a twenty year retirement program for members of the New York city employees' retirement system employed as investigators by district attorneys' offices; and to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the establishment of twenty year retirement programs for such members who are subject to articles 11 and 15 of such law".
Items.MatterName: Establishment of a twenty year retirement program for members of the NYCERS employed as investigators (S.5140, A.7357)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Maltese, S.367-A, and Assembly Member Pheffer, A.153-A, "AN ACT authorizing the city of New York to reconvey its interest in certain real property acquired by in rem tax foreclosure in the borough of Queens to former owner of the Estate of Anne Signorile Tomlinson, notwithstanding expiration of the two year period within which application may be made to the city to release its interest in property thus acquired; Block No. 9137, Lot No. 252 on tax map for the borough of Queens".

State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass a bill introduced by Senator Leibell, S.5288, and Committee on Rules, A.8648, "AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing retroactive credit for investigators and detectives who transferred into the police department of the city of New York from the transit authority and housing authority police departments".
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Providing retroactive credit for investigators and detectives (S.5288, A.8648)

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor  - "AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to contracts for public work". S.3497/A.6123

State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass a bill introduced by Senator Leibell, S.5288, and Committee on Rules, A.8648, "AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing retroactive credit for investigators and detectives who transferred into the police department of the city of New York from the transit authority and housing authority police departments".
Items.MatterName: Providing retroactive credit for investigators and detectives (S.5288, A.8648)
